entry.title: Wednesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear early this evening. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High zero with temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending early in the afternoon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High zero with temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 29 March 2023
